name: Fairfield Inn Rochester Airport

reviews.text: Across the road from the airport terminal, this hotel is definitely the best option for any traveller using Rochester as a lay-over.
reviews.title: Location, location
Great Location and Staff
reviews.text: The hotel itself contains a relatively large room with all the required amenities including cable internet access (free) and a large TV. Rooms were very clean and comfortable and staff were very courteous.

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.text: The only downside would be the lack of local dining. The hotel has in room service, however this is shipped in from their nearest Hilton. If you are without a car then room service or takeaway appear to be your only alternatives.

One of the best Fairfield Inn's we have stayed at. Conveinently located next to the airport terminal just a quick walk away. Their parking package was very helpful in allowing us to park in the airport's shuttle lot. Best yet, they offered their continental breakfast at 5:00 am for early flights so we were able to eat before our 6:35am flight to Florida.
reviews.title: I've seen better

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Fairfield during a blizzard in January, 2005. The room was clean and well kept. Being more of a hotel for short stays, they exceeded our expectaions.
reviews.title: Great

aka: Fairfield Inn Rochester Airport Hotel Rochester
